issue.title: [JS] RangeError in Vector.toArray()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18247](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18247). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`vector.toArray()` throws a `RangeError: offset is out of bounds` exception when it is called on a vector created with two or more `arrow.Data` objects and at least one has been padded for memory alignment.

 

See reproduction here: <https://observablehq.com/d/14488c116b338560>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18247?focusedCommentId=17628647) by thomas sarlandie (tsarlandie):*
I have submitted a PR to fix this issue.
